attributes.action: create legislation to limit to four years the term of office of the government and to prevent a person from serving as Prime Minister for more than two consecutive terms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should copy the sensible practice followed by the United States, in relation to the length of time any Government or holder of high office can serve,to prevent the unseemly behaviour that we have recently seen and to stop any one person from gaining too much power an d influence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
